  +> proto@col:~$ /release/.info <------------------------------------+
     
     Mercenaries is a revolutionary, third person action-shooter game set in
     the near future and inspired by real world events. On the eve of an 
     historic reunification of North and South Korea, a ruthless general 
     stages a military coup, takes control of North Korea and then threatens 
     the world with nuclear war. In response, the international community 
     launches a global task force to stabilize the country.
